001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.modal;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.base.ComponentType;
004
005/**
006 * Defines a specific type of modal component, extending {@link ComponentType} to ensure
007 * a standardized approach for identifying and interacting with modal dialog elements
008 * in a UI automation framework.
009 *
010 * <p>Implementation classes can represent different modal styles, enabling
011 * consistent handling across various dialog presentations within the application.
012 *
013 * <p>This interface helps group modal attributes and identification logic,
014 * ensuring that all modals are managed under a common contract.
015 *
016 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
017 */
018public interface ModalComponentType extends ComponentType {
019}
